ygData.subject: Re: New Troll SK
ygData.msgSnippet: My troll had a 67 int and could cast the spell. Be aware tho, at this time SK pets on RK are useless. Since they are so low level compared to you they wont
ygData.messageBody:
My troll had a 67 int and could cast the spell. Be aware tho, at this time SK pets on RK are useless. Since they are so low level compared to you they wont attack people in your PvP range.
----- Original Message -----
From: Stuart Christian
To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
Sent: Wednesday, May 12, 1999 3:08 PM
Subject: [eq_shadowknights] New Troll SK


I'm switching to the Rallos Zek server to kill a few of those goodie goodies and am wondering what my INT has to be to cast leering corpse at level 10? My troll now on E'ci is level 10, almost level 11, and still can't it and I don't want to make this mistake again. I believe my INT is around 62 on E'ci. Thanks

-Stu
